com.facebook.litho.animation

Class SimpleAnimationBinding

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.litho.animation.SimpleAnimationBinding
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AnimationBinding

    public class SimpleAnimationBinding
extends java.lang.Object
implements AnimationBinding
    An AnimationBinding corresponding to a single GraphBinding. It adds the ability to add bindings to PendingNodes.

      • addPendingBinding

        public void addPendingBinding(ValueNode fromNode,
                              PendingNode toNode,
                              java.lang.String inputName)
        Adds a PendingBinding from a concrete ValueNode to a PendingNode. The binding will actually be added at runtime when the PendingNode can be turned into a concrete ValueNode. If BindingSpecs are added, resolvePendingNodes(com.facebook.litho.animation.PendingNodeResolver) must be called before this binding is activated.

      • addPendingBinding
